price: Kapag nakakita ka roon ay makakikita ka ng isang kaginhawahan at isang paghaharing malaki.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
